name: Doors Godot Remake
description:
Original made by LSplash

Thanks for kurumik for some of the ost

Some of the sound effects come from Spooky's Jumpscare Mansion, the game, both original and the remake are inspired by Spooky's Jumpscare Mansion

THIS IS A DEMO

This game looks unfinished because its just a demo, alot of more things are to come!
